subject: RE: [junit] Is there any way I can use a failed test invoke other function?
msgSnippet: Thanks Todd. The thread you gave is helpful. I tried AspectJ code, it really works for every assert* function, but my problem is that I need just for the
messageBody:
Thanks Todd.
The thread you gave is helpful. I tried AspectJ code,
it really works for every assert* function, but my
problem is that I need just for the failed/error
cases.


--- "Bradley, Todd" <todd.bradley@...> wrote:

> Not really. See this thread for more:
> http://groups.yahoo.com/group/junit/message/12878
>
>
> Todd.
>
>
>

> Is there any way I can let a failed test or
> assert function
> like
> assertTrue(false) to invoke my own log method?
> thanks a head.
